The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 February is 3,456,961 (6,141.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 02 February, there were 131,258 new confirmed cases (233.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 January, there were 174,645 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 25% (43,387 fewer cases).
